name: Feast of Deceits
introduction:
◆ Rules ◆
● After completing the mission "Youci's Clever Decor," Pure Fiction stages will be unlocked.
● Pure Fiction stages and rewards are refreshed regularly. 

◆ Refresh Rules ◆
● Pure Fiction and Memory of Chaos are updated alternatively every two weeks, with updates occurring at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> on Mondays (server time).
● Each period of Pure Fiction will be open for 6 weeks.
